group_1.narration: I didn't know anything about Tsuruno.
I felt terrible and frustrated about it,@but crying won't change anything.
Surely the person suffering the most right now@was Tsuruno herself, and I knew Yachiyo must be even more upset@than I was that she couldn't save her.
I didn't know the sadness Tsuruno bore,@I was wrong in my perception of her, and I didn't understand her,@even though she's one of my dearest companions.
I'm sure Yachiyo is the same way.
But what we didn't know, we could still learn,@because there were still things we could do to help.
And so...
Yachiyo and I were able to connect for the second time@and separate Tsuruno from the Rumor.
We did make a mistake, yes,
But just like how I myself was able to change,@if we made a mistake, we could correct it, and if we were weak,@we could still take each other's hand and support each other.
If we didn't understand each other,@we could still get to know each other again@in the days to come.
I know it must be everyone I met so farãƒ¼@Kaede and her friends, and all of us at Mikazuki Villa,@who taught me that.
I was confident that we would be able to move forward again,@hand in hand.
Then, Madoka and I destroyed the device@that the Wings of Magius used to gather Witches.
Because of that, Walpurgis Night, which was heading for@Kamihama City, changed its course to Mitakihara City,@to where Madoka and her friends had to return.
I was a bit sad, since I was just thinking@that I might be able to get along with them.
But both sides have things to do, so we parted ways,@hoping to see each other again someday.
What I...have to do...
I want to meet Ui once again.
I want to see how my wish turned out.
That's why I'm going to face up to it,@no matter how cruel the future may be.
Because I WILL find Ui.
And then,
We'll find out about the truth that disappeared.
Whenever I think back,@I was always protected by the very people@I thought I was protecting,@because I didn't know anything...
Well, I'm sure that's still the case today.
Even so, it's true that I have changed a lot@since I came to Kamihama City@and met everyone here.
I can even say that I have friends who I can make up with@after a big fight now.
...So, I don't know what I can do,@but someday I have to repay everyone.
Just like how Ui made me a "big sister",@it's because I have friends to protect that I can do my best.
So, you know,@I'm going to grow stronger and stronger.
After all, Yachiyo taught me that@I can't protect someone unless I become strong.
Strong and capable of protecting what's important to me,@that's the kind of person I'd like to become.
